comments.body: I am afraid these six lines will not look good in a notebook. If you are already familiar with the notebook interface, what you can do is copy these lines into a cell of type markdown in a notebook, and then remove the first "#" character from each line. This is exactly what will happen in the translation into a notebook.

hh = makeTH1()
